name: Gateway is unavailable
description: Checks whether the gateway is available

fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. Check the status of the VPC and ensure that it is in the 'available' state.
 2. Verify that the security group associated with the VPC has the necessary rules allowing traffic from your client.
 3. Confirm that the route table associated with the VPC has the correct routes configured.
 4. If using a VPN connection, ensure that the VPN connection is established and active.
 5. Try restarting the IBM Cloud CLI or the API toolkit if experiencing issues.
 6. If the problem persists, contact IBM Support for further assistance.

For more information on troubleshooting this issue, refer to the official IBM Cloud documentation: <https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/vpc?topic=vpc-troubleshoot-gateway-unavailable>
